Header: New Heads for four institutions coming under the Ministry of Buddha Sasana, Culture and Religious Affairs
Content: New heads have been appointed for institutions coming under the Ministry of Buddha Sasana, Culture and Religious Affairs. Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa presented these letters of appointment to the new heads at Temple Trees. Prof. Gamini Adhikari has been appointed as the Acting Director General of the Central Cultural Fund. Dr. Jayantha Dharmadasa has been appointed as the Chairman of the National Film Corporation. Rohan Welivita has been appointed as its Working Director. Douglas Siriwardena is the Director General of the Tower Hall Foundation while Stella Marapone received the letter of appointment as Chairman of the Public Performance Board.
